resources.string: Plankton has once again tried stealing the krabby patty to obtain the secret formula. Your objective is to look for all the missing Krabby Patties with the help of the Krabby Patty scanner. Each cell will either contain a scanner which will display the number of Krabby Patties in that row and column, or if you are lucky, an entire Krabby Patty that Plankton has stolen. Your goal is to find all the Krabby Patties with the help of the least amount of scanners. Good luck.
This application was created by Akash Dhami as a submission for Assignment 3 for

All Spongebob Squarepants content present in this application including but not limited to text, images, and audio-visual content is the respective property of Nickelodeon 2020, and has been used for educational purposes only for this class.
Congratulations! You found all of the Patties!
